body_text:
Did ops resolve this problem?
…
On 13 Nov 2017 5:51 p.m., "Yaroslav Bulatov" ***@***.***> wrote:
 Can you make sure ops are placed on CPU?

 with ops.Graph().as_default() as g, ops.device('/job:worker/task:1'):
       with ops.device('/cpu:0'):
            const = constant_op.constant(17)

body:
Did ops resolve this problem?

On 13 Nov 2017 5:51 p.m., "Yaroslav Bulatov" <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> Can you make sure ops are placed on CPU?
>
> with ops.Graph().as_default() as g, ops.device('/job:worker/task:1'):
>       with ops.device('/cpu:0'):
>            const = constant_op.constant(17)
>
> TemsprF
